postReview.title: Liverpool 2-1 West Ham: Late Van Dijk header moves Slot's side two wins from title
postReview.description: Liverpool need just two wins from their last six Premier League games to clinch the title after Sunday's victory over West Ham at Anfield.

preReview.title: Preview: Liverpool look to get back to winning ways as West Ham visit Anfield

QAData.question: Who won between Liverpool and West Ham United on Sun, 13 Apr 2025 13:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Liverpool won 2–1 over West Ham United on Sun, 13 Apr 2025 13:00:00 GMT.
